articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Command of Large Combined Unit 526 of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Command of Large Combined Unit 526 of KPA
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the Command of Large Combined Unit 526 of the KPA to congratulate its service personnel on significant December 24.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song and Kim Tong Hwa.
					
					 He extended warm congratulations to all service personnel of the unit celebrating the holiday.
					
					 He said that leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the revolutionary armed forces marked a historic event of great significance in developing the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and carrying out the cause of socialism, and a great auspicious national event which provided a firm guarantee for the destiny and future of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il ushered in the greatest heyday of the development of the revolutionary armed forces with his rare wisdom, outstanding commanding art and matchless guts, he noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il strengthened the People's Army into the invincible revolutionary forces, placed all people under arms and turned the whole country into a fortress and thus put the country on the position of the world's military super power. These undying exploits will shine for all ages.
					
					 He underlined the need to always remember the brilliant annals in which all service personnel and people performed epoch-making miracles and brought about innovations in their struggle for protecting socialism and building a thriving nation, weathering storm and stress unprecedented in history under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, and significantly commemorate December 24, the day when he was held in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the undying exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il recorded in the annals of the unit's history, he said it was thanks to their wise leadership and meticulous care that the unit has grown to be a powerful and matchless combat unit.
					
					 Praising the unit for arranging well the above-said rooms and conducting effective education of its service personnel through them, he underscored the need for the unit to intensify the education of them in the undying leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and thus help all its service personnel add glory to the proud tradition of the unit by performing feats in rounding off combat readiness and bolstering up combat capabilities.
					
					 At the operation command rooms, the room devoted to military research and the pistol shooting gallery, he heard a detailed report on training and the unit's performance of duty.
					
					 He was satisfied to learn that the large combined unit arranged well the operation command rooms as intended by the party and  scrupulously operated the room devoted to military research, thus helping its commanding officers and members of the staff steadily improve their ability to map out and command combat operations.
					
					 He instructed the unit to put utmost spurs on rounding off its combat readiness with the firm viewpoint and stand that it should be wholly responsible for its combat readiness before the party, always bearing in mind that a war breaks out without any prior notice.
					
					 Noting that the unit has a very important duty to perform, he indicated important tasks to be fulfilled by it to bolster up its combat capability in every way.
					
					 Going round various places including the hall of service personnel and the mushroom greenhouse, he learned about the political and ideological education, supply service and command and management of the unit.
					
					 Expressing expectation and belief that the service personnel of the unit would firmly defend with arms the socialist country dynamically advancing toward a final victory, while keeping themselves in perfect combat readiness, he had a photo session with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Se
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Se
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of Pro. and Dr. Kim Jong Se, Kim Il Sung Prize winner and researcher of Kim Chaek University of Technology, expressing deep condolences on his death.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Issues Open Questionnaire
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Issues Open Questionnaire
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released a following questionnaire Wednesday one year since Park Geun Hye became "president" through fraud-marred election.
					 Park has run the whole gamut of rhetoric such as "road of peace and common development" and "new era on the Korean Peninsula," vociferating about "reform" and "confidence" whenever an opportunity presented itself during her election campaign and after her assumption of office, the questionnaire noted, and continued: All compatriots are, however, recollecting how deceptive and shameless jargons they were.
					
					1. How does the present regime's north policy differ from the Lee Myung Bak regime's confrontation policy?
					
					  The Park regime's policy toward the north has nothing different from the Lee Myung Bak regime's confrontation policy. Park's policy surpasses that of the Lee regime in its crafty and vicious nature. 
					
					 This proves that the Park regime is just the continuation of the Lee regime and it only seeks fiercer confrontation with the DPRK than Lee's. 
					
					2. Who is the arch criminal harassing peace and escalating tension on the peninsula?
					
					 After taking office the Park regime has become all the more dangerous in its moves to provoke a war against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 All this goes to prove that the U.S. and its stooge Park regime are the arch criminals who have disturbed peace and escalated tensions on the peninsula.
					
					3. Confidence or confrontation?
					
					 Park Geun Hye pledged to "take one step after another to build confidence between the south and the north" while talking about "confidence-building".
					
					 But behind the scene, she challenged head-on the social system in the DPRK, while calling for "giving priority to the regime change in the north" and urging the north to "opt for making real change".
					
					 Park went the lengths of slandering the policy of the DPRK. She let loose such vituperation as terming it "way of inviting isolation" and "the north will never succeed".
					
					4. To whom does Park give priority, outsiders or the nation?
					
					 After taking office, Park tightened nexus with the U.S. more zealously than any others, while calling for "tightened south Korea-U.S. alliance" and "all-inclusive alliance."
					
					 Park and her group even subordinated the north-south ties to the U.S. policy for invading the DPRK, while blustering that "south-north relations can be settled smoothly only when south Korea-U.S. alliance is tightened".
					
					 Park made no scruple of committing such act of treachery as begging for "international cooperation" to stifle the DPRK, while malignantly slandering the fellow countrymen during her trip to the U.S. and other countries in Europe.
					
					5. Who is a provoker?
					
					 The Park group never opens its mouth without talking about "provocation" and "threat" to justify its confrontation and war moves.
					
					But the reality proves that it is none other than the U.S. and the Park regime which are keen to provoke a war on the peninsula.
					
					6. Who is responsible for mud-slinging and who is obliged to stop it?
					
					 The puppet group of conservatives is malignantly slandering the DPRK. They range from the "president", "prime minister", representative of "the Saenuri Party", authorities concerned, paid journalists and experts to anchor persons.
					
					 It is hurling even aged ultra-right conservatives and human scum into smear campaigns against the DPRK. It is the Park regime which should stop the smear campaign.
					
					7. Who should make a right option?
					
					 South Korea is now swept by waves of fierce actions of people of all social standings against the puppet regime's sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular rule.
					
					 The reality shows that it is none other than Park Geun Hye herself who should make a right option.

articles.title: Anniversary of Tanchon Mining Research Institute Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Tanchon Mining Research Institute Marked
 Tanchon, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Tanchon Mining Research Institute in South Hamgyong Province marks the 50th anniversary of its foundation. 
					 For the past five decades since its foundation on Dec. 26, Juche 52 (1963), it has guaranteed scientifically and technologically the development of the giant base for the production of nonferrous metal ore in the area of Tanchon.
					
					 The scientists and officials of the institute successfully solved the scientific and technological problems arising in putting the mining and nonferrous metal industry on a Juche-oriented and modern basis.
					
					 They also carried out to their credit the scientific and technological tasks of studying and introducing new method of blasting and putting the production process on a modern basis.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, scientists and employees of the institute.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the scientists and employees of the institute was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: New Software Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Software Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A new software for checking up power of locomotion was developed by Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.
					 The program is well received by users for its easy application.
					
					 It can be installed even in cell phone to enable any user to have access to his or her capacity for locomotion. If one inputs to cell phone available data like heart rate and body weight after physical training, it will screen his or her conditions, including quantity of motion, intake of oxygen and index of changed physiological functions.

articles.title: New Year Calendars Off Press
articles.content:
New Year Calendars Off Press
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) --The Korea Publications Export and Import Corporation has published various kinds of calendars for 2014.
					 Seen in a calendar are photos of sceneries of Jong Il Peak, Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu, Mt. Kumgang and other scenic spots in all seasons.
					
					 Another calendar, with Sinsollo (traditional Korean dish) against Chongnyu Restaurant on its front page, carries photos on varieties of national dishes, along with their recipes.
					
					 Among the calendars is also a quarterly calendar featuring pictures of different fruit trees in full boom.
					
					 A calendar pictures children in national costumes, with a juvenile song of the enlightenment period on its every page.
					
					 Calendars of diverse themes and pull-off calendars were brought out by other publishing houses, too.

articles.title: DPRK's Signal Successes in Its Drive to Emerge Sports Power
articles.content:
DPRK's Signal Successes in Its Drive to Emerge Sports Power
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- This year the DPRK witnessed spectacular successes in the development of Juche-orented sports.
					 The work for the development of sports has definitely turned into a drive involving the whole party and state and all people. As a result, a hot wind of sports swept across the country and successes in international sports events pleased the country all the year.
					
					 The year saw more than 40 tournaments among various sports teams and working people's teams. There took place DPRK Championships, national sports contest of workers, the eleventh grand bull prize national ssirum contest and other competitions.
					
					 Sportspersons achieved such spectacular successes as bagging 390 medals including 164 gold medals in over 70 international games including the recent 14th Asian Youth Judo Championship and the 7th Asian Junior Judo Championship.
					
					 Taekwon-Do players also won four trophy cups and 28 medals including 21 gold medals and demonstrated the spirit of orthodox martial art unique to the Korean nation.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un unrolled a grand plan to build a sports power in the advance of a new century of Juche true to the noble intentions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and wisely led the struggle to realize it. 
					
					 A solid material and technical foundation has been laid to develop the nation's sports under the care of the party.
					
					 Pyongyang Indoor Stadium was successfully remodeled as a comprehensive indoor stadium and popular sports service center, the modern Pyongyang International Football School appeared on the picturesque Rungna Islet and sports village in Chongchun Street is renovated.
					
					 Many gymnasiums, stadiums and sporting parks were built in different parts of the country including Pyongyang and sportspersons, working people of various circles and school youth and children conducted brisk sporting activities.
					
					 This year witnessed various domestic sports contests and other games and popular sports activities.
					
					 DPRK sportspersons achieved great successes in international games.
					
					 Many sports experts, fans and media in the world praised the successes made by Korean sportspersons this year as victories of sports teams of the DPRK in sky-high spirits and promising stars.

articles.title: Million of People Visited Bust of Kim Jong Suk This Year
articles.content:
Million of People Visited Bust of Kim Jong Suk This Year
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, working people, school youth and children is visiting the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					 The number of visitors is increasing on the occasion of her birth anniversary, December 24, reaching tens of thousands on a daily average.
					
					 This year the number totaled more than a million of over 15,000 units.
					
					 The visitors laid bouquets and flowers before her bust and made bows.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have rendered sincere aid to preserving well the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong in deep reverence for her.
					
					 Among the visitors were many foreigners and overseas Koreans who laid bunches of flowers before her bust and paid respects.

articles.title: Relics of Tomb Belonging to New Stone Age Excavated
articles.content:
Relics of Tomb Belonging to New Stone Age Excavated
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Institute of the History of Humankind Evolution and the Faculty of Historical Science of Kim Il Sung University and the Archaeological Study Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences excavated in the basin of the Taedong River the relics of a tomb belonging to the New Stone Age.
					The tomb four meters in length and two meters in width was found in a cave in Ransan-ri, Kangdong County, Pyongyang. Found inside it were 260 bones considered to be those of nine persons, 22 earthenware pieces, 1 personal ornament, 2 knives made of clams and 80 animal bones.
					
					Through the analysis of the bones, the research group ascertained in unison that they are bones of Koreans in the New Stone Age.
					
					Earthenware pieces were scientifically proved that they belong to the end of the middle period of the New Stone Age.
					
					Bones of Koreans belonging to the New Stone Age were found in the basin of the Taedong River in the past but it is the first time that bones of so many people were found in just one site.
					
					The research group proved that the site is a tomb, not a place where peopled led their living.
					
					The discovery is of a great significance in making a scientific and theoretical study of the anthropological features of Koreans who created the culture of the New Stone Age in the basin of Taedong River with Pyongyang as its center, the type of their tombs, funeral rites and burial manners of them and the Culture of Taedong River.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Suppression of Trade Union Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Suppression of Trade Union Protested
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations in south Korea on Dec. 22  protested against the vicious repressive racket kicked up by the puppet police against the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 The Unified Progressive Party denounced the police for hurling more than 5,000 riot troops into the operation to occupy the headquarters of the confederation and mercilessly suppress it that day despite the dismissal of a search warrant against the confederation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The racket revealed the regime's ulterior intention to realize the privatization at any cost by removing hurdles lying in its way.
					
					 The regime should be aware that its suppression of trade unions' just struggle is little short of sparking off its own crisis.
					
					 The Democratic Party said the tyrannical action taken against the confederation fully disclosed the true nature of Park Geun Hye regime's rule under the pretext of security.
					
					 The Committee for Labor and Social Affairs of the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society declared that it would hold the regime and police fully accountable for the action as they are keen to stave off their crisis by physical force.
					
					 The Solidarity for Social Progress warned that the on-going violence would trigger off all-people resistance in the future.

articles.title: Koreans in US Demand Park Geun Hye Step down
articles.content:
Koreans in US Demand Park Geun Hye Step down
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Dec. 19 issued a statement demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					 One year has passed since Park held office as "president" by masterminding the election rigging, it said, adding:
					
					 Although there are convincing evidence of the illegal involvement of south Korean power organs in the election, she has mercilessly cracked down on the people, far from admitting her sin.
					
					 It is more intolerable that she has resorted to suppressing those who denounce the fraudulent election and demand the punishment of the mastermind behind it after labeling them as "enemy-benefiting forces" and "forces following the north."
					
					 As long as she seizes the power, it will become more impossible to expect the peaceful reunification, and the people will undergo more serious sufferings due to the economic bankruptcy and campaign to eliminate "those following the north." 
					
					 The people do not want her to remain in power any longer.
					
					  She had better step down though belatedly, and must face punishment together with Lee Myung Bak who is one of the masterminds behind the election rigging.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Demand Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Demand Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. at a meeting on Dec. 20 demanded the resignation of Park Geun Hye, according to the south Korean Internet paper Thongil News.
					 At the meeting, the speakers pointed to the problems related to Park's policies against common people and labor and her dictatorial rule and urged her to step down for justice of the south Korean society.
					
					 They declared that they would carry on their struggle till Park steps down.
					
					 A joint statement was issued at the meeting.
					
					 Then the participants staged a demonstration, chanting the slogans "Park Geun Hye, the chief culprit of the fraudulent election, step down!", "Arrest Lee Myung Bak, the chief culprit of the fraudulent election!", "Dissolve the Intelligence Service which orchestrated the election rigging!" and "Park Geun Hye is not legitimate 'president'!".

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in Shenyang, China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in Shenyang, China
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show took place in Shenyang, China on Dec. 13 on the occasions of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, the 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display at the venue were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were potted Kimjongilias against the background of a large fine art piece depicting the star of Generalissimo and Kim Jong Il's birthplace in Paektusan secret camp.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were officials of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Shenyang City People's Government and a businessmen's association of Liaoning Province, masses and Koreans in China.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK consul-general in Shenyang and staff members of the consulate-general.

articles.title: Chinese Praise Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Chinese Praise Kimjongilia
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Those who visited the venue of Kimjongilia show in Shenyang, China were greatly excited to see the famous flower.
					 The chairperson of the Center for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries under the Publicity Department of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China, said:
					
					 Kimjongilia is a flower reflecting boundless reverence of all people for leader Kim Jong Il, a great man.
					
					 He was a close friend of the Chinese people. He performed undying feats for the development of Sino-Korean friendly relations.
					
					 The show helped me keenly realize once again the need to invariably develop the traditional Sino-Korean friendship provided and cultivated by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with Chinese revolutionaries of the elder generations.
					
					 The secretary of the General Office of the Shenyang City People's Government said in the excited tone that the beautiful Kimjongilias made him cherish deep reverence for Kim Jong Il who is always remembered not only by the Korean people but by the Chinese and other world people.
					
					 The chairperson of a businessmen's association of Liaoning Province said:
					
					 We attach great importance to this show.
					
					 The show would mark an important occasion for helping the Chinese people know better about Kim Jong Il's efforts for the development of Sino-Korean friendship and the reverence of mankind for him.
					
					 We sincerely wish the Korean people great success in building a thriving nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Organizations for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed
articles.content:
Organizations for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Organizations for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism were newly inaugurated or named in many countries since Marshal Kim Jong Un formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and clarified its vitality.
					 Juche idea followers in Peru, Venezuela, Benin, DR Congo, South Africa and many other countries formed organizations for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism out of single mind to make great contribution to the human cause of independence with pride as disseminator of the great idea and pioneer of the era.
					
					 The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism with the first secretary of the Rostov Regional Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks as its chairman was organized in Rostov of Russia.
					
					 Liaison committees for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism were newly organized in Fukushima, Okinawa, Gunma, Kanto and Kansai of Japan in the wake of the formation of the society for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. And the group for the study of works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was formed in Germany and the association for the study of Juche philosophy in DR Congo.
					
					 The study organizations group prominent figures of political parties and organizations of relevant countries and prominent scholars and Juche idea followers.
					
					 The groups for the study of the Juche idea in Russia, Nigeria, Italy, Bulgaria, Mexico, the U.S. and other countries were named organizations for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and they are conducting brisk activities for study and dissemination.
					
					 They are improving the style and methods of their activities as required by the developing situation.
					
					 Diverse methods have been studied and applied including the use of  latest scientific and technical means like internet, steadily increasing the effectiveness of the activities. They also include seminar, lecture, round-table talks, book and photo exhibition and film show.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in various countries on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were held by the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, Ali Ali School of Karachi of Pakistan, Rajabat Pranakorn University of Thailand and the Kimilsungia Greenhouse of Guinea from December 8 to 17.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the feats of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The minister for Rural Development and Special Development of the Sind State Government of Pakistan in his speech said as follows:
					
					 Humankind is boundlessly admiring Kim Jong Il for the great exploits he performed in victorious advancing the socialist cause, defending world peace and security and promoting the friendship and unity among countries upholding the banner of independence against imperialism. 
					
					 Thanks to the precious revolutionary heritage left by Kim Jong Il the Korean people have dynamically pushed forward the building of a thriving socialist nation with faith in victory.
					
					 The principal of Ali Ali School of Karachi of Pakistan highly praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader who provided an everlasting foundation for building a thriving nation and a defender of socialism and justice.
					
					 The chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association lauded the revolutionary life of the peerlessly great man who made an immortal contribution to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence upholding the banner of Songun.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association in Guinea stressed that Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of the progressive humankind along with the prosperous socialist Korea.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at remembrance meetings held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held in Russia and a lecture, book and photo exhibition and a film show in India and Pakistan and a reading session in Guinea on December 16 and 17 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of the book and photo exhibition were photos documenting the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and pictures introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the gifted wisdom and noble virtue of Kim Jong Il who performed immortal exploits in the cause of building a thriving nation and achieving the national reunification with his outstanding political ability.
					
					  The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi said Kim Jong Il was a man of outstanding stratagem and matchless pluck. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il led to victory the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism regarding the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism. 
					
					 The reality in the DPRK instills the great courage into the progressive mankind advancing along the road of independence against imperialism.
					
					 An official of a construction group of Guinea said that Kim Jong Il led the Workers' Party of Korea for decades and thus achieved the great exploits, adding his feats serve as the eternal motive force giving a powerful impetus to the socialist cause of the DPRK.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita comandancia de gran unidad combinada 526 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita comandancia de gran unidad combinada 526 del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del significativo 24 de diciembre, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 526 del EPC y felicito a los oficiales y soldados.
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song y Kim Tong Hwa.
					
					El Mariscal felicito calidamente a todos los oficiales y soldados de la unidad que celebran la fiesta (el 24 de diciembre).
					
					Senalo que el nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el maximo cargo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias fue un acontecimiento historico para el desarrollo del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y el cumplimiento de la causa socialista y devino un gran jubilo nacional que garantizo el destino y el futuro de la patria.
					
					Prosiguio que con su extraordinaria perspicacia, destacado arte de mando militar y audacia incomparable, el Dirigente dejo abierta la era dorada de desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Anadio que brillaran para siempre las inmortales hazanas de el quien situo a nuestro pais en la posicion de superpotencia militar de talla mundial al fortalecer el EPC como invencible ejercito revolucionario y lograr el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais.
					
					Debemos celebrar significativamente el 24 de diciembre en que el Dirigente fue nombrado como Comandante Supremo del EPC sin olvidar nunca las brillantes decadas en que bajo su guia, los militares y habitantes coreanos vinieron creando milagros y cambios del siglo en la defensa del socialismo y la construccion de un Estado prospero superando los vientos y mareas sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Kim Jong Un recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recordando con profunda emocion las imperecederas hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il registradas en la historia de la unidad, apunto que la gran unidad combinada pudo desarrollarse como poderosas filas de combate gracias a la sabia orientacion y minuciosa atencion de ellos.
					
					Evaluo el hecho de que la unidad educara bien a los militares a traves de la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial. 
					
					Instruyo que ella debe intensificar aun mas la educacion con los datos referentes a las inmortales proezas de guia de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu para que todos los militares glorifiquen la orgullosa tradicion de su unidad con los exitos en la preparacion de combate y el incremento de combatividad.
					
					Pasando revista a las salas de mando de operaciones y de estudios militares, el salon de tiro con pistola, el Comandante Supremo escucho el parte detallado sobre el estado de entrenamiento y cumplimiento de misiones.
					
					Se mostro complacido de que la unidad haya acondicionado bien las salas de mando de operaciones conforme al proposito del partido y elevara sin parar la capacidad de organizacion de operaciones y combates y del mando de los comandantes y los funcionarios del Estado Mayor al operar con escrupulosidad la sala de estudios militares.
					
					Hay que dar mas acicate a los preparativos de combate partiendo del punto de vista y la posicion de responsabilizarse totalmente ante el partido de la preparacion de combate de su unidad sin olvidar ni un momento que la guerra se desata sin anuncio, enseno.
					
					Es muy importante la mision que asume esta gran unidad combinada, dijo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en centuplicar la combatividad de ella.
					
					En su recorrido por la Casa de los Militares, el invernadero de cultivo de hongos y otros puntos, el Mariscal averiguo los detalles de la educacion ideo-politica, la intendencia, el mando y la administracion de la unidad.
					
					Tomo una foto de recuerdo con los oficiales y soldados de la unidad expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos defenderan firmemente con fusiles la patria socialista, que avanza vigorosamente hacia la victoria final, manteniendose en la perfecta disposicion de combate.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de Kim Jong Se
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de Kim Jong Se
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio la vispera una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del fallecido investigador de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Kim Jong Se, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung, profesor titular y doctor, expresando profundas condolencias por su deceso.

articles.title: CRPP publica acta de interpelacion abierta
articles.content:
CRPP publica acta de interpelacion abierta
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que se cumple un ano desde cuando Park Geun-hye tomara la posesion como "presidenta" surcoreana mediante las elecciones fraudulentas, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 25 un acta de interpelacion abierta.
					Durante las elecciones y despues de la toma de posesion, Park usaba expresiones elegantes como el "camino de paz y desarrollo comun" y la "nueva epoca de la Peninsula Coreana" mencionando repetidamente la "renovacion" y la "confianza".
					
					Hoy en dia, toda la nacion coreana vuelve a comprender cuan enganosas y cinicas fueron las promesas electorales de ella, senala el acta y formula las siguientes preguntas:
					
					1. ?Que diferencia hay entre la "politica sobre el Norte de Corea" del actual "regimen" surcoreano y la politica conflictiva del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak?
					
					No hay ninguna diferencia entre ellas y la politica de Park supera la de su antecesor en la astucia. Esto demuestra que el "poder" de Park es una prolongacion del "regimen" de Lee y resulta mas conflictivo.
					
					2. ?Quien es el autor que destruye la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y exacerba la tension de esta region?
					
					Despues de la llegada al poder de Park, en contubernio con Estados Unidos, se tornaron mas peligrosas las maniobras de guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					Todos los hechos insinuan que EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos son los que destruyen la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y exacerbaron la tension de la region.
					
					3. ?Quiere la confianza o el enfrentamiento?
					
					Al hablar tanto de la supuesta "creacion de confianza", Park juro "dar pasos adelantes para construir la confianza entre el Sur y el Norte de Corea".
					
					Pero, detras de la cortina, desafio frontalmente al regimen de la RPDC diciendo que "el prerrequisito es el cambio del regimen del Norte" y "este debe entrar en el camino de cambio verdadero".
					
					Para colmo, censuro la politica de la RPDC diciendo que "producira solo el aislamiento" y "no saldra exitosa".
					
					4. ?A quien concede primacia, a las fuerzas foraneas o a la nacion?
					
					Despues de la toma del poder, Park fortalecio mas que nadie el contubernio con EE.UU. abogando por "consolidar la alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU." y "las relaciones de alianza global".
					
					Diciendo que "pueden ser mejoradas las relaciones intercoreanas" cuando sea firme la "alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU.", Park y su banda sujetaron las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas a la agresiva politica de EE.UU. sobre Corea.
					
					Durante su visita a EE.UU., Europa y otros paises del mundo, ella calumnio a la parte connacional y mendigo sin vacilacion alguna la "cooperacion internacional" para aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					5. ?Quien es el provocador?
					
					 La banda de Park justifica siempre sus actos de confrontacion y guerra hablando tanto de la "provocacion" y "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					 Pero, la realidad demuestra que los provocadores en la Peninsula Coreana son Estados Unidos y la camarilla de Park.
					
					  6. ?Quien es el que tiene la responsabilidad de calumnia y difamacion y debe pararlas?
					
					  En la actualidad, calumnian al unisono a la RPDC todos los conservadores surcoreanos, inclusive la "presidenta", el "premier", el representante del "Partido Saenuri", las autoridades, los periodistas venales, los especialistas y los locutores.
					
					  Ademas, se incorporan al complot anti-RPDC hasta los conservadores ultraderechistas viejos y otras escorias humanas.
					
					  El que debe parar la difamacion es precisamente la banda de Park.
					
					  7. ?Quien debe tomar la opcion correcta?
					
					  Hoy en dia, en el Sur de Corea se libra intensamente la lucha de los habitantes de diversos sectores, indignados por los actos traidores y serviles a grandes potencias, de confrontacion fratricida y la infame politica antipopular de las autoridades titeres.
					
					  La realidad deja conocer que Park es quien debe tomar la opcion correcta.

articles.title: Exitos logrados en 2013 por los deportistas de RPDC
articles.content:
Exitos logrados en 2013 por los deportistas de RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se abrio este ano en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la era dorada de desarrollo deportivo.
					A tenor de los esfuerzos de todo el partido, el Estado y el pueblo por desarrollar el deporte nacional, la ola deportiva recorrio todo el territorio nacional.
					
					Este ano, se realizaron mas de 40 citas deportivas importantes como el Campeonato Nacional, la competencia nacional de los obreros, el torneo nacional de Sirum (lucha coreana) por el premio Gran Toro.
					
					Los deportistas conquistaron 390 medallas en total, de ellas 164 de oro, en mas de 70 juegos internacionales entre otros el XIV Campeonato Asiatico de Judo de Jovenes, efectuado recientemente, el VII Campeonato Asiatico de Judo de Juniores, etc.
					
					Los taekwondocas coreanos pusieron de pleno manifiesto el impetu de ortodoxo arte marcial de la nacion coreana al obtener 4 trofeos y 28 medallas, de ellas 21 de oro.
					
					En pleno acato al noble proposito de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un trazo el magno proyecto de convertir el pais en una potencia deportiva en la marcha de la nueva centuria del Juche y dirigio sabiamente esta labor.
					
					Bajo la guia del partido, se ha sentado la base material y tecnica para el desarrollo de deporte nacional.
					
					El Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang fue acondicionado como gimnasio polivalente y base de servicio de deportes masivos mientras en el pintoresco islote Rungna fue edificada la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang.   
					
					Igualmente, esta en el proceso de remodelacion la villa deportiva del reparto Chongchun.
					
					En Pyongyang y otras localidades se levantaron muchos palacios, estadios y parques deportivos donde los profesionales, los trabajadores y los jovenes y escolares practican varios deportes.
					
					Por otra parte, numerosos especialistas, aficionados y medios de prensa del mundo elogiaron a los deportistas coreanos, que lograron exitos alentadores, como estrellas prometedoras.
